official-title.#text:
Expressing support for designation of the week of September 15, 2014, through September 21, 2014,
			 as

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the
sponsor.#text: Ms. Eddie Bernice Johnson of Texas

text.#text: recognizes the importance of raising public awareness about vestibular disorders.
Whereas vestibular (inner-ear-balance) disorders are underdiagnosed and undertreated;
Whereas 80 percent of people 65 years of age and older have experienced dizziness;

Whereas vestibular disorder patients may consult 4 or more physicians and spend 50 months or more
			 in their search for a diagnosis;

quote.#tail:
to reduce the time it takes to diagnose a vestibular disorder by helping patients recognize their
			 symptoms and encouraging them to seek help from a qualified vestibular
			 specialist; and

text.#text: Whereas the Vestibular Disorders Association celebrates

Whereas the week of September 15, 2014, through September 21, 2014, would be an appropriate week to
			 designate as

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 731 IH: Expressing support for designation of the week of September 15, 2014, through September 21, 2014, as “Balance Awareness Week”.
